description.text: At 3rd level, a phrenologist can use his performance to send his own senses into another's skull, as the spell witness (DC = 10 + 1/2 the phrenologist's class level + his Charisma modifier). At 11th level, this performance's duration increases to 10 minutes per bard level, and at 19th level, the duration increases to 1 hour per bard level. In your head relies on audible components.
